Ghost Staff Directory (Hover to Reveal Their Workplace Habits)

Hemsworth the Transparent

Head tailor. Died in 1892 while correcting a bishop's cuff angle.

Specialty: sleeves that imply emotional sophistication.

Keeps stealing my thimbles and whispering, "Your seam allowances are cowardly."

Miss Static Whisp

Pattern drafter. Can fold silk with no hands and maximum judgment.

Specialty: bias cuts that make exes regret texting.

Once possessed the copier to print 400 tiny poems about darts.

Uncle Pawl (Mostly Vapor)

Press liaison. Technically deceased, legally still networking.

Specialty: getting us into magazines that fear us.

Says "synergy" then vanishes into the snack cupboard.

Press Releases & Public Incidents

Statement: Yes, the runway was in a pet cemetery.

Published Monday at 11:57 PM, then unpublished Tuesday at 4:03 PM by chronology reversal.

We selected the venue for acoustics and spiritual foot traffic. Attendees described the collection as "unexpectedly moving" and "concerningly warm near the mausoleum." Both are compliments.

Correction: The "fur storm" was not weather.

During Look 12, my ceremonial brushing intensified. We regret the confusion and stand by the texture.

Breaking: Rival label Dogue & Bone sent us a fruit basket.

We accepted the pears, rejected the "thoughts and woofs," and mailed back a note reading: "Stay in your lane, barkitects."

FAQ for the Living, the Dead, and Hybrid Freelancers

Do you make outfits for non-cats?

Yes. I believe all species deserve structure, drama, and strategic side-eye. We size from kitten to horse mysteriously "medium."

What does "time runs backward on Tuesdays" mean for shipping?

Your order may appear before checkout, disappear briefly, then return pressed. This is normal. Please stop emailing "paradox??" in all caps.

Can I visit the atelier in person?

Appointments are available by candlelight only. Bring one fabric swatch and one emotionally significant secret.

What if a ghost staff member compliments me?

Say thank you, bow slightly, and never ask their age. We are not monsters.
